import React, { useState } from 'react' import './products.scss' import coverPic from '../../assests/images/products.avif' import Card from '../../components/Card/Card' import { data } from '../../data' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Products = () => { const [selectedRange, setSelectedRange] = useState(4000); const[selectedCatogary,setSelectedCatogary] =useState(['Jackets,Coats']) const[sortyBy,setSortby] =useState() return (

Filter by categories

setSelectedCatogary(e.target.value)}/>

Filter by Price

0 { setSelectedRange(e.target.value) }} /> {selectedRange}

Sort by

setSortby(e.target.value)}/>
setSortby(e.target.value)} />
{data.filter((product)=>{ return product.price<=selectedRange}) .sort((a,b)=>sortyBy==='lowest'? a.price -b.price:sortyBy==='Highest'? b.price-a.price:console.log) .map((item) => { return( < React.Fragment key={item.id.toString()}> ) })}
) } export default Products
